title: Taven's Departing
description: Taven’s dead and that's about all he knows or remembers. Left on his own, he  unleashes the dream junkies, beings able to destroy generations of his family, living and deceased. Fortunately for Taven, it’s his mistake that gives him the power to stop them.“Mr. Jackson is a very gifted writer and this book is definitely worth a read.” Doreen (goodreads.com)“This was a surprising, heartfelt and deeply thought provoking read for me and I truly enjoyed every moment of it.” Megan (goodreads.com)“... emotional highs and lows, twists and turns....quite enjoyable. I look forward to more from this author.” Crystal (goodreads.com)“A definite must read.” Andy (goodreads.com)iBookstore - https://itunes.apple.com/us/book/tave...Kobo - http://www.kobobooks.com/ebook/Tavens...Kindle - http://www.amazon.com/Tavens-Departin...Soft Cover - https://www.createspace.com/3972893
author: Mike   Jackson
